misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a charismatic figure hailing from St. Laurence Golf, is a well-known player at the Hector Trophée. Spectators can often find Martin with a drink in hand, adding to his relaxed and affable persona.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin's experience is undeniable. His dedication and skill have led him to victory on more than one occasion, securing one coveted Hector Trophée title. He has also distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player, earning one Victor Trophy.
As he prepares for his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Martin undoubtedly aims to leverage his extensive experience to further solidify his legacy at the tournament.
